topic.title: Advance Care Planning Services Grouping Value Set

row.entry: Advance Care Planning Services Grouping Value Set - 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.69.1

Value Set: Advance Care Planning Services Grouping Value Set urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.69.1 This value set includes concepts that describe the type of advance care planning services. It groups value sets that express these concepts in SNOMED CT and CPT. Concepts from the Advance Care Planning Services Value Set can be used with the serviceEvent/code element in the header of the Summary of Care document when such services have been provided during the encounter.
